data.title: Travel Distance between Lahore and Kalka
data.meta_description: Lahore, Pakistan to Kalka, India distance • How many miles / kilometer from Kalka to Lahore? Travel direction, route map & air travel distance between Kalka and Lahore.
data.text:
Distance Between Lahore and Kalka

Given below is the distance between Kalka, India and Lahore, Pakistan. A map showing location of Kalka and Lahore with air travel direction is also provided. Along with Lahore - Kalka distance, you can also find current time & time difference between Kalka and Lahore, lattitude & longitude of both cities and flight duration.

Kalka time is 30 minutes ahead of Lahore

Kalka to Lahore Distance • Map & Travel Direction

Travel direction from Kalka to Lahore is and direction from Lahore to Kalka is

The map below shows the location of Kalka and Lahore. The blue line represents the straight line joining these two place. The distance shown is the straight line or the air travel distance between Lahore and Kalka.

What is the travel distance between Kalka, India and Lahore, Pakistan? How many miles is it from Lahore to Kalka. 161 miles / 259.1 km is the flight distance between these two places.
